name: cwic
title: cwic - cloud workstation in container
summary: Your home directory in the cloud! The DNAnexus cloud!:-)

inputSpec.name: image
inputSpec.label: Docker image name
inputSpec.help: Docker image name to be loaded. If it is not provided, and no credential file is provided, a default dnanexus/cwic-base:latest will be used. See Readme for details

inputSpec.name: cmd
inputSpec.label: Command
inputSpec.help: A command to be executed. If it is provided, an non-interactive mode of the cwic will be loaded to run the command and exit

inputSpec.name: credentials
inputSpec.label: Credentials
inputSpec.help: A file storing an access token and user login information to a Docker registry where a Docker image holding the user's cwic instance will be stored
